channel.title: Shut down Whonix gateway before Workstation\Ubuntu gateway
channel.description: Hello! Tell me please. There are any problems with privacy, then I turn off or restart the whonix gateway in front of the Workstation \ Ubuntu gateway. This happens because of the unstable Internet. Can ip leak? Thx!

item.title: Shut down Whonix gateway before Workstation\Ubuntu gateway
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
No. Connection fails closed because the only way to contact the internet is thru gateway.

Read full topic
item.source: Shut down Whonix gateway before Workstation\Ubuntu gateway

item.title: Shut down Whonix gateway before Workstation\Ubuntu gateway
item.dc:creator: Sadito
item.description:
Hello! Tell me please.
There are any problems with privacy, then I turn off or restart the whonix gateway in front of the Workstation \ Ubuntu gateway.
This happens because of the unstable Internet.
Can ip leak?
Thx!
